mapper.sql: user_id, record_time, description, pictures_url, lat_bd09ll, lng_bd09ll, address
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM moments ORDER BY record_time DESC LIMIT #{count};
mapper.insert: insert into moments (user_id, record_time, description, pictures_url, lat_bd09ll, lng_bd09ll, address) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picturesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lngBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into moments
user_id,
record_time,
description,
pictures_url,
lat_bd09ll,
lng_bd09ll,
address,

mapper.update:
update moments
record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pictures_url = #{picturesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lat_bd09ll = #{latBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lng_bd09ll = #{lngBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update moments set record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictures_url = #{picturesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat_bd09ll = #{latBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lng_bd09ll = #{lngBd09ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
